name: theteachernetwork
description: The Teacher Network is a website that connects Philadelphia school teachers with the community and the community with school teachers.  On the teacher side, this site is intended to be a resource for teachers to use to obtain supplies, connect with community organizations and corporations, and to provide a forum to exchange ideas between teachers and community members. On the community/corporation sides, businesses and organizations can offer extra supplies and let teachers know what resources, like internships or community partnerships, are available to teachers.
